title: Best of The Herd for Jul 15, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Jul 15, 2020
description:
Mike McCarthy might not want Dak with the Cowboys long term

Sam Darnold's career could be ruined by his front office 

Colin lists the 11 QBs that can win a Super Bowl

There are two ways this season can go for Dak Prescott

College Football would work in the Spring


Guest: Nick Wright, FS1's First Things First

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
